oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mt. Zion CME Henderson: front
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mt. Zion Colored Methodist Episcopal Church

Color photograph of Mt. Zion CME Church. The gable-fronted church is a single-story, brick building. It features a gable roof and steeple. The church cornerstone is inlaid into the brick of the facade. Two sidewalks provide street access to the church. The church sign appears near the street.

Located in Henderson, Tennessee, Mt. Zion Colored Methodist Episcopal Church has a "very good 1960 building." The current building sits in an older African American neighborhood and down the street from Cool Springs Baptist Church. At the time of fieldwork, Willie Adams served as minister.
